channel.title: [PI] Sprites Help
channel.description:
i have followed this money orb tutorial : http://www.rune- server.org/runescape-development/rs2-client/tutorials/364738-new-runescape-money-orb.html
my results from following it was succes, besides the sprite images aren't showing correct, they are showing on the loading screen heres a pic of how it looks like.
[IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/1112m43.png[/img]
and in-game it's like, when i right click where the pouch should be (like real rs), i get the options to choose and etc, but i can't see the orb, heres a pic. :
[IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/1iloyc.png[/img]
Please help me out of this, i have looking for fixes and tried alot myself, but no luck :(

item.title: [PI] Sprites Help
item.dc:creator: @ownedin3d ownedin3d
item.description:

i have followed this money orb tutorial : http://www.rune- server.org/runescape-development/rs2-client/tutorials/364738-new-runescape-money-orb.html

and in-game it’s like, when i right click where the pouch should be (like real rs), i get the options to choose and etc, but i can’t see the orb, heres a pic. :
